fragment.set-body: <nav> <button hx-get="/page/{{context.Variables["previousPage"]}}" hx-target="body" hx-push-url="true" {% if context.Variables["currentPage"] <= 100 %}disabled{% endif %}> ◀ Previous </button> <input type="number" id="pageNum" value="{{context.Variables["currentPage"]}}" min="100" max="999" /> <button onclick="htmx.ajax('GET', '/page/' + document.getElementById('pageNum').value, {target: 'body', pushUrl: true});"> Go to Page </button> <button hx-get="/page/{{context.Variables["nextPage"]}}" hx-target="body" hx-push-url="true"> Next ▶ </button> </nav>
